title.narrative: Education Project

description.narrative: Namibia - Education Project: Aims to improve the quality of and access to education and training for under-served groups, enhancing the quality of the country's labor force and increasing employment opportunities for youth.

title.narrative: Addressing Barriers to Education in Namibia

Improving Community Vocational Centers in Namibia

Improving the General Education and Access to Textbooks

Measuring Results of the Namibia Vocational Training Grant Fund
